entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -30.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 04:57 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -30.1°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -33.6°C
Wind: NNW 37 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
